//  this containes all the action types and necessary actions required when needed in order to dispatch them //
export var TYPE={ADDQUIZ:"ADDQUIZ",TOGGLEACTIVE:"TOGGLEACTIVE",DELETEQUIZ:"DELETEQUIZ",GETNAME:"GETNAME",PLAYQUIZ:"PLAYQUIZ",GETANSWER:"GETANSWER",RESET:"RESET"};export var addQuiz=function addQuiz(data){return{type:TYPE.ADDQUIZ,payload:data};};export var toggleActive=function toggleActive(id){return{type:TYPE.TOGGLEACTIVE,payload:id};};export var deleteQuiz=function deleteQuiz(id){return{type:TYPE.DELETEQUIZ,payload:id};};export var getName=function getName(name){return{type:TYPE.GETNAME,payload:name};};export var playQuiz=function playQuiz(id){return{type:TYPE.PLAYQUIZ,payload:id};};export var getAnswer=function getAnswer(ans){return{type:TYPE.GETANSWER,payload:ans};};export var resetQuiz=function resetQuiz(){return{type:TYPE.RESET};};
